title: Four Engine Architecture Specification
description: Main specification document for the four-engine financial advice system
purpose: Define the overall architecture and requirements for the four-engine system (LLM Orchestrator, Calculation Engine, Strategy Engine, Advice Engine)

title: Four Engine Architecture Implementation Plan
description: Detailed implementation plan and roadmap for the four-engine system
purpose: Provide a comprehensive implementation roadmap with milestones, dependencies, and task breakdowns

title: Data Model Specification
description: Data structures and models for the four-engine architecture
purpose: Define the data structures, schemas, and relationships used across all four engines

title: Interaction Architecture Design
description: Design document for engine interactions and communication patterns
purpose: Define how the four engines interact, communicate, and coordinate their operations

title: Data Models and APIs Checklist
description: Validation checklist for data models and API contracts
purpose: Ensure all data models and API contracts are properly defined and validated

title: Requirements Checklist
description: Comprehensive checklist of all system requirements
purpose: Track and validate all functional and non-functional requirements

title: API v1 Contract
description: OpenAPI specification for version 1 of the system APIs
purpose: Define the REST API contracts and schemas for external integrations

title: Calculation Engine Contract
description: Interface contract for the Calculation Engine
purpose: Define the interface and capabilities of the Calculation Engine

title: Error Handling Contract
description: Standardized error codes and handling patterns
purpose: Define error codes, messages, and handling strategies across all engines

title: LLM Orchestrator Contract
description: Interface contract for the LLM Orchestrator Engine
purpose: Define the interface and orchestration capabilities of the LLM Orchestrator

title: Strategy Engine Contract
description: Interface contract for the Strategy Engine
purpose: Define the interface and strategy capabilities of the Strategy Engine

title: Quick Start Guide
description: Quick start guide for developers joining the project
purpose: Provide developers with essential information to get started quickly

title: Research and Analysis
description: Research findings and technical analysis
purpose: Document research findings, technical evaluations, and architectural decisions

title: Calculation Catalog
description: Catalog of all calculations supported by the system
purpose: Comprehensive catalog of all financial calculations and formulas supported

title: Web Frontend Specification Input
description: Input requirements and specifications for the web frontend
purpose: Define the requirements and specifications for the web frontend component

title: Frankie's Finance Specification Input
description: Input requirements and specifications for Frankie's Finance
purpose: Define the requirements and specifications for the Frankie's Finance application

title: Specification Reorganization Instructions
description: Instructions for reorganizing and maintaining project specifications
purpose: Provide guidelines for organizing, maintaining, and updating project specifications

title: LLM Prompts Catalog
description: Tracking catalog for all LLM prompt files
purpose: Maintains metadata for all LLM prompt files including creation dates, descriptions, mode associations, and dependencies

title: LLM Source Materials Catalog
description: Tracking catalog for all LLM source material files
purpose: Maintains metadata for all LLM source material files used internally for prompt development

title: Australian Financial System Primer
description: Overview of Australian financial institutions, products, tax system, and investment structures
purpose: Internal reference for developers creating prompts. Provides comprehensive context about Australian financial system without exposing sensitive knowledge to external LLMs.

title: Financial Advice Process Guide
description: Stages of financial advice, adviser responsibilities, client communication patterns, and documentation requirements
purpose: Internal reference for developers creating prompts. Provides comprehensive context about the financial advice process without exposing sensitive knowledge to external LLMs.

title: Regulatory Environment Overview
description: ASIC regulatory framework, Best Interest Duty, licensing requirements, consumer protection, and privacy laws
purpose: Internal reference for developers creating prompts. Provides comprehensive context about Australian financial services regulation without exposing sensitive knowledge to external LLMs.

title: Interaction Pattern Library
description: Common user question types, educational content delivery patterns, risk communication frameworks, and conversation flows
purpose: Internal reference for developers creating prompts. Provides comprehensive context about common interaction patterns in financial advice without exposing sensitive knowledge to external LLMs.
